name: Chain Devil
damage_resistances: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chain devil makes two chain attacks and commands up to two animated chains under its control to make chain attacks.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 16) and restrained. Until the grapple ends  this chain can only attack the grappled target.

special_abilities.name: Devils Sight
special_abilities.desc: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

special_abilities.name: Lawful Evil
special_abilities.desc: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Rattling Chains
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the devil moves, the rattling of its chains can be heard up to 300 feet away, unless it moves at half its Speed.

special_abilities.name: Relentless Tracker
special_abilities.desc: Once the devil has grappled a creature in its chains, it has advantage on ability checks made to track that creature for the next 30 days.
